info.name: EASB - ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Nonstd Module API
info.description: API collection for ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Nonstd Module - managing ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Non-Standard data.

item.name: ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Nonstd Management (SUPERADMIN Only)
Create ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Nonstd

request.description:
Create a new ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Nonstd entry. Requires SUPERADMIN role.

**Fields:**
- `idAsbKomponenBangunanNonstd` (number, required): ID of the related ASB Komponen Bangunan Nonstd
- `min` (number, optional): Minimum value
- `avgMin` (number, optional): Average minimum value
- `avg` (number, optional): Average value
- `avgMax` (number, optional): Average maximum value
- `max` (number, optional): Maximum value

item.name: Update ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Nonstd

request.description:
Update an existing ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Nonstd. Requires SUPERADMIN role.

**Fields:**
- `id` (number, required): ID of the ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Nonstd to update
- `idAsbKomponenBangunanNonstd` (number, optional): ID of the related ASB Komponen Bangunan Nonstd
- `min` (number, optional): Minimum value
- `avgMin` (number, optional): Average minimum value
- `avg` (number, optional): Average value
- `avgMax` (number, optional): Average maximum value
- `max` (number, optional): Maximum value

item.name: Delete ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Nonstd

request.description:
Delete an ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Nonstd entry. Requires SUPERADMIN role.

**Fields:**
- `id` (number, required): ID of the ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Nonstd to delete
